results.title: Fibrate/Statin initiation in warfarin users and gastrointestinal bleeding risk.
results.text_hl: RESULTS: Chronic @CHEMICAL_Warfarin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D014859 @@@warfarin@@@ users had an increased odds ratio of @<m>DISEASE_Gastrointestinal_Hemorrhage</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006471 @@@gastrointestinal bleeding@@@ upon initiation of @CHEMICAL_Gemfibrozil @CHEMICAL_MESH:D015248 @@@gemfibrozil@@@ (1.88; 95% confidence interval [CI], 1.00-3.54] for the first prescription; 1.75; 95% CI, 0.77-3.95 for the second prescription); @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ (1.46; 95% CI, 1.03-2.07 for the first prescription; 1.60; 95% CI, 1.07-2.39 for the second prescription); or @CHEMICAL_Atorvastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000069059 @@@atorvastatin@@@ (1.39; 95% CI, 1.07-1.81 for the first prescription; 1.05; 95% CI, 0.73-1.52 for the second prescription).

citations.NLM: Schelleman H, Bilker WB, Brensinger CM, Wan F, Yang YX, Hennessy S. Fibrate/Statin initiation in warfarin users and gastrointestinal bleeding risk. Am J Med. 2010 Feb;123(2):151-7. PMID: 20103024
citations.BibTeX: @article{20103024, title={Fibrate/Statin initiation in warfarin users and gastrointestinal bleeding risk.}, author={Schelleman H and Bilker WB and Brensinger CM and Wan F and Yang YX and Hennessy S}, journal={Am J Med}, volume={123}, number={2}, pages={151-7}}

results.title: Renal failure caused by a partly calcified aortic aneurysm in a patient with dabigatran therapy
results.text_hl: Due to the @<m>DISEASE_Gastrointestinal_Hemorrhage</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006471 @@@gastrointestinal bleeding@@@ and the persistent @DISEASE_Kidney_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D007674 @@@impaired renal function@@@, @CHEMICAL_Dabigatran @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000069604 @@@dabigatran@@@ was stopped.

citations.NLM: Jud P, Gary T, Tiesenhausen K, Portugaller R, Hackl G, Brodmann M. Renal failure caused by a partly calcified aortic aneurysm in a patient with dabigatran therapy Medicine (Baltimore). 2017 Apr;96(17):e6789. PMID: 28445318
citations.BibTeX: @article{28445318, title={Renal failure caused by a partly calcified aortic aneurysm in a patient with dabigatran therapy}, author={Jud P and Gary T and Tiesenhausen K and Portugaller R and Hackl G and Brodmann M}, journal={Medicine (Baltimore)}, volume={96}, number={17}, pages={e6789}}
